name: Pathwinder
description:
Pathwinder has a twist up its sleeve and a twist to your perspective.

Pathwinder was made for Riverside Game Jam 2022 with the theme "Upside Down/Inside Out" and was made in 2 days by Nathan S (concept + visuals) and Kieran R (programmer). This early build of the game contains 5/10 levels and small bugs may occur.
